pullrequest.title: Support multiple xunit files with same name

content.raw:
I’ve tested this change under the works for [#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/857](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/857) . Seems to have solved the problem there where tests were using same filenames. 

Tested her:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64&build=29)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2\_gazebo\_pkgs-ci-default\_crystal-bionic-amd64/29/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64/29/))

5 errors reported, same than in the console `64% tests passed, 5 tests failed out of 14`
content.html:
I’ve tested this change under the works for #!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/857 . Seems to have solved the problem there where tests were using same filenames.

Tested her:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64/29/)

5 errors reported, same than in the console 64% tests passed, 5 tests failed out of 14
